author: Doina Chiacu
title: U.S. death toll from coronavirus approaches 1,000
description: The U.S. death toll from the coronavirus approached the milestone of 1,000 on Thursday as hospitals in New York and other hot spots struggled to treat a flood of patients and the U.S. Congress neared approval of $2 trillion in aid to counter the pandemic's ec…
content: WASHINGTON/NEW YORK (Reuters) - The U.S. death toll from the coronavirus approached the milestone of 1,000 on Thursday as hospitals in New York and other hot spots struggled to treat a flood of patients and the U.S. Congress neared approval of $2 trillion in … [+4045 chars]
